subject: OPTOM
title: Ophthalmic Optics 1
description: Single vision spectacle lenses.  Lens and frame materials.  Optical and ophthalmic instrumentation.  Image quality.  Polarization.  Tinted lenses.  Decentration and prismatic effect.  Obliquely crossed cylinders.  Spectacle magnification.  Ophthalmic laboratory procedures: measurement of spectacle lens power.
